title: SOLD: Lot of 4 Postcards With HOFers Mathewson, McGinnity, McGraw, Ed Walsh
author: Head928

posts.post_title: SOLD: Lot of 4 Postcards With HOFers Mathewson, McGinnity, McGraw, Ed Walsh
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is a lot of 4 post cards:
-1905 Giants Post Cards w/ Christy Mathewson, Bowerman Ames, Mertes, McGinniity, Taylor
-1906 Hammon Co White Sox Team with Ed Walsh
-1910? (I don’t know the date) Polo Grounds with John McGraw
-1910 Forbes Field with writing on the back written to Professor F.N. Raymond at the University of Kansas 

SOLD for all 4 shipped
Paypal FF, check, MO
